wedikawen arambai bandulage rangana, sinamawe da pasu kaleka rupawahini thiraye da satahanwa thibu bawa indrachapa dani.natya pariwarthanaya, wisheshayen maha natyakaru shekspiyarge natya pariwarthanaya bandula withanage nam wu natyakaruwage palamu kamaththa wuye ya. 1974 di ‘bekat’ natyaya nishpadanaya kala bandulage wedika natya athara ‘doloswani rathriya’, ‘wanisiye welenda’, ‘senehebara doli’, hiru dahasak, 'romaya gini gani’ natya wu bawa samipa rupayata hasuwe.hondama adhyaksha lesa da hondama pariwarthana adhyaksha lesa da bandula withanage natya karuwa ‘romaya ginigani’, ‘senehebara doli’ ha ‘hiru dahasak’ wani nishpadana sandaha rajya sammanayen pidum ladde, ohu thula eki kalawa arabaya wu apramana kusalatha nisa ma bawa indrachapa dani.

meya “nawa wammun” adasiyawasakata pera padanam wu mulika sankalpaya maya. 1968 di siduwuwak men, “1917 pa්rashna pilibanda thawula awasan karana lesa” kerena mema kandawuma yomu wi aththe, wiplawawadi, makswadi deshapalana pakshayakin nayakathwaya lada kamkaru panthiya balaya allagath palamu saha ekama wiplawaye nyaya, wadapiliwela, pa්rathipaththi saha mulopayika padam adhyayanaya kirimata erehiwa ya.
